resources.string: "Use the menu\nto start the game on level %1$d"
"Congratulations\nYou solved the board in\n%1$d seconds with %2$d moves"
"Turn the discs\nto reconstruct the original board"
"Welcome to the Enigma Puzzle â€“ a game as difficult as the Rubik's cube. This puzzle was invented by Douglas A. Engel and it consisted of two intersecting disks in a plastic holder."

"In the middle of the screen you see the actual playing area. It consists of two circular disks that are intersecting each other. On each disk, there are six stones alternating with six bones. The stones look like overweight triangles, the bones as malnourished rectangles."

"Since the disks are intersecting, they share two stones and a bone. If a disk, let's say the upper one, is rotated by 60 degrees, then one stone and one bone that had previously also belonged to the lower disk are replaced by a new stone and new bone."

"Right next to the playing area there are four buttons arranged with little arrows. With these buttons, the two disks may be rotated. The arrow, that directs to upper right means, for example, that the upper disk shall be rotated 60 degrees to the left (anticlockwise)."

"The rotations can also be initiated with a gesture on the touchscreen. This requires a tap on the appropriate disk and then a move in the appropriate direction. When you release the screen, the rotation will be executed."

"The menu contains the option 'New Game' to start a new game in the current level. In this case there are a couple of random disc rotations in different directions. Depending on the settings, the rotations are displayed or not. Now you have to get the discs back to its original position by turning the discs. The first action starts the clock."

"You can interrupt a running game by the action 'Return'. At a new start of EnigmaPuzzle the game continues with the interrupted state. You can also cancel a game entirely. For that you use the menu item 'Stop'"
"When you solve a level, the level will be increased automatically to the next level. You can set the current level with the menu."
